item.title: The kill joy, ready made type
item.description: What an easy life when you are an ignorant! Dull face. Knows all football matches. Actually, this fellow made an art from sitting in front of a TV with a 4-for-Â£4 pack and trying to prove that this is his life passion. I think I could made another passion from observing clouds in the garden. I would watch them for hours while they change their shapes, move around in the sky, still sitting in the chair and observing them pointlessly.
